response.overview: Inseparable childhood friends Shou-heng (Shane) and Cheng-shing (Jonathan) are thrown into chaos when a new girl comes to town and falls for the former. The chemistry between these three becomes an increasingly difficult mixture of love, resentment, respect, caring, jealousy, and misunderstanding.
response.tagline: No One Wishes To Be Lonely, Neither Do We
response.title: Eternal Summer
